pullrequest.title: Fix loading models from database in GUI on OSX

content.raw: It was hard to reproduce on my Ubuntu Desktop but happens more often on my mac laptop. It crashes in the callback event that gets triggered when the list of models from the model database are loaded. So if you see the model database list in gzclient's `Insert` tab after some seconds then that means it won't crash any more. The `model_database` integration test caught this and I fixed it there but forgot about the GUI which also uses this event connection.
content.html: It was hard to reproduce on my Ubuntu Desktop but happens more often on my mac laptop. It crashes in the callback event that gets triggered when the list of models from the model database are loaded. So if you see the model database list in gzclient's Insert tab after some seconds then that means it won't crash any more. The model_database integration test caught this and I fixed it there but forgot about the GUI which also uses this event connection.
